MajorClaims.MC1: some tough experiences people met before will be helpful in their life path
MajorClaims.MC2: most tough experiences in people's life path will be a priceless treasure to them

Claims.C1: experiences of difficulties teach them how to keep a nice mood and have confidence all the time
Claims.C2: people who experienced lots of difficulties will be calmer when they are in troubles

Premises.P1: hardship makes people realize how to cherish and compliment the common but wonderful little things happened in their life such as, a shining weather, a delicious breakfast and etc
Premises.P2: People who have such nice spirit usually know how to find the true love in their life instead of being seduced by greed as to lose themselves in the end
Premises.P3: they are conscious of what to do and how to do when fierce crisis happens
Premises.P4: they already have such experiences of overcoming some difficulties
Premises.P5: Those people are more likely to achieve their ambitions in their career
Premises.P6: they are aware of how to lead people to reach success despite what kind of difficulties are getting in their way
